items.title: New low knocks Insta360’s Flow 2 Pro gimbal with Apple DockKit subject-tracking, gesture control to $111
items.summary:
As part of its wider clearance sale, Woot is offering Insta360’s Flow 2 Pro smartphone gimbal in Summit White finish for $111.30 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This is the standard Flow 2 Pro bundle that typically goes for $160, so you’re looking at a straight-up $49 discount right now. It’s the lowest we have seen this unit fetch to date, and it’s $16 less than the previous all-time it hit during the Black Friday sale last year at Amazon. It remains one of the most capable smartphone gimbals you can get your hands on right now, so be sure to snag it while it’s down to its lowest price after getting more details below.

Today’s offer knocks an extra $35 off its usual rate – bringing it $10 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last year. This is the lowest price we’ve seen for this mouse since launch, and you can learn more about it below.

As part of its Deals of the Day offers, Best Buy has currently listed Acer’s Chromebook Plus Spin 514 notebook for $499 shipped. This is one of the latest Chromebooks Acer has in its catalog that hit the scene towards the end of last year carrying a $699 price tag. Today’s deal shaves $200 off its usual going rate to mark one of the lowest prices we have seen it fetch to date since its debut. It briefly dropped to $479 earlier this month during the initial wave of Presidents Day deals that went live at Best Buy, and today’s price lands it within just $20 of that all-time low. This is a solid chance to grab it at nearly the same price in case you missed that earlier offer.

items.title: Bluetti offers a second-chance window to grab the Handsfree backpack power stations with 100W panels from a $399 low, more
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Bluetti Winter Backup Sale, the brand is once again offering the same collection of flash bundle deals at up to 47% off through tomorrow night. This gives you another window to pick up the Bluetti Handsfree 1 Backpack Power Station with a 100W solar panel at $399 shipped, which comes in $50 under the current Amazon pricing. Dropping back down from a full $629 rate, we saw this same offer last week during the previous phase of flash sales, giving you another chance to take advantage of a $130 markdown and grab it for your outdoor adventures at the lowest price we have tracked. You’ll also find the Handsfree 2 Backpack Power Station with a 100W solar panel at its second-lowest price of $499 shipped, as well as the larger 1,536Wh AC240 Power Station and a 200W solar panel at $1,199 shipped (matching at Amazon), it’s third-lowest price after falling from a $1,899 full rate.
